title: Mike Downey - IMDb
snippet: Mike Downey. Self: ESPN SportsCentury. Mike Downey was born on 9 August 1951 in Chicago Heights, Illinois, USA. He was married to Gail Martin. He died on 12 June 2024 in Rancho Mirage, California, USA.

title: Mike Downey, Free Press sports columnist during '84 World Series, dies
snippet: Downey married for the first and only time in June 1999, a few weeks shy of his 48th birthday.

title: Mike Downey, Free Press sports columnist during '84 World Series, dies - Yahoo Sports
snippet: His wife, Gail Martin Downey, is a daughter of Dean Martin. They met when she mentioned to a mutual friend how much she enjoyed his writing in the Times, and he revealed their wedding to readers in yet another memorable column.

title: Michael Joseph Downey - Pizzi Funeral Home
snippet: Michael Joseph Downey, 57, a devoted husband and father and producer of award winning TV commercials, died suddenly, Monday, March 18 at home in Norwood, New Jersey. In 2004, Mike and his wife Christen Downey, founded Hero Content, a production ...

title: With fond memories and appreciation to a friend and inspiration, the great Mike Downey – Never a Bad Game
snippet: A few days before our wedding two decades ago, a small package arrived for Patricia and me from Rancho Mirage, Calif. Inside, a CD. Dean Martin’s “Love Songs.” And there was a handwritten note from the sender, a man named Mike Downey. He had heard of the wedding from a mutual friend and ...
